name: Failed Logon From Public IP
description: A login from a public IP can indicate a misconfigured firewall or network boundary.
false_positives: Legitimate logon attempts over the internet
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4625 AND (NOT ((source.ip:*\-*) OR (source.ip:(10.* OR 192.168.* OR 172.16.* OR 172.17.* OR 172.18.* OR 172.19.* OR 172.20.* OR 172.21.* OR 172.22.* OR 172.23.* OR 172.24.* OR 172.25.* OR 172.26.* OR 172.27.* OR 172.28.* OR 172.29.* OR 172.30.* OR 172.31.* OR 127.* OR 169.254.*)) OR (source.ip:\:\:1 OR source.ip:(fe80\:\:* OR fc00\:\:*)))))`
